title: This Week's Top Stories - The GOP's Reality Check, William Barr Steps Down & Shower Power for Trump
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - The GOP's Reality Check, William Barr Steps Down & Shower Power for Trump
description:
The Supreme Court rejects a Texas lawsuit aiming to overturn election results, Attorney General William Barr resigns, and President Trump rolls back water restrictions for showers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
